  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      This is the method used to add players.
      Parameters:
      player - receives an object of type player and checks if it can be created, if it already exists it will return an error.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String name)
      This is the method used to remove players.
      Parameters:
      name - receives the player name and checks if it exists, if it does it will delete it.

    • checkExistence

      public boolean checkExistence(String name)
      This is the method used to check if a player exists.
      Parameters:
      name - used to checks if it exists in the player ArrayList.
      Returns:
      checker if true means the player exists, if false it doesn't exist yet

    • checkStart

      public boolean checkStart()
      This is the method used to check if the game can start.
      Returns:
      if there is at least 1 player in the ArrayList it let's the game start.

    • getGoal

      public int getGoal()
      This is the method used to get the game goals.
      Returns:
      returns game goal.

      This is the method used to set game goals.

      goal - set game goal.

      This is the method used to run the rounds.
